summary: Just a simple mod that adds a couple of new animals into Riften
descriptionHtml:
Adds 3 chickens, 2 dogs and 2 goats into the city of Riften. I thought it lacked in some domestic pets. Nothing exciting. This is also my very first mod so, if it\'s buggy or messed up, I apologize, this is a new experience for me. Neither dog can be made a follower but if it gets requested enough I\'ll tweak around with it. 

HARLEY - The guard dog, so to speak, of Riften. He is by the north gate, once you get inside he should be right there.

JIMBLES - A stray that hangs around the market place.

GRALK & EDDY - Two goats that hang out around the Thieves Guild entrance and the cemetary.

SOME CHICKENS - Three chickens that are found usually by the orphanage.
author: wacmwns
